thread.title: WATCH: Sydney s savage heatwave ignites fireworks in boot of luxury car - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: WATCH: Sydney s savage heatwave ignites fireworks in boot of luxury car - Yahoo7

author: Sam Hussey
title: WATCH: Sydney s savage heatwave ignites fireworks in boot of luxury car - Yahoo7
text:
Share WATCH: Sydney s savage heatwave ignites fireworks in boot of luxury car - Yahoo7 Sydney’s savage heatwave has claimed another victim, igniting a set of fireworks in the boot of a luxury at a busy north shore shopping strip. Close Sydney heatwave ignites fireworks in boot of luxury car UP NEXT VIDEO Sydney heatwave ignites fireworks in boot of luxury car. Source: Facebook/ Will Dodshon Sydney heatwave ignites fireworks in boot of luxury car 
As pedestrians tried to avoid the blistering summer heat, a luxury BMW X1 parked on Victorian Avenue in Chatswood erupted in smoke. 
One brave shopper was filmed rushing to open the doors and boot of the smoke-filled car before spraying a fire extinguisher. 
As smoke poured from the vehicle, the man filming the incident, Will Dodshon, was forced to back away as the heat became too much to handle. The luxury BMW with the numberplate 'pyro' burst into smoke on Saturday afternoon. Source: Facebook 
One witness said that the car belonged to a professional pyro-technician. 
“The best part is that his number plate was "pyro”, Phoenix Montgomery commented. 
“As one of the firies that turned up we found this most amusing.” 
And while the man’s BMW looked a little worse for wear, those who viewed the footage weren’t particularly sympathetic.
